thread.title: Forget the back-and-forth between players, fans, coaches or
thread.title_full: Forget the back-and-forth between players, fans, coaches or

author: rivals.com
title: Forget the back-and-forth between players, fans, coaches or
text:
Forget the back-and-forth between players, fans, coaches or even programs over social media - on Thursday morning Rivals made the case that Florida is the real DBU.
Florida was the only program included in each of the three separate cornerback rankings released by the network to judge past and current success at the position.
PRE-COMBINE TOP FIVE CORNERBACKS In his top five pre-combine cornerback listing Mike Farrell rates Jalen Tabor No. 2, while Quincy Wilson comes in at No. 5
Pre-Combine cornerback rankings
TOP 10 CORNERBACK SIGNING CLASSES Powered by signees Shawn Davis , C.J. Henderson and Marco Wilson , Florida signed the No. 4 rated cornerback class on Rivals.
Top 10 cornerback signing classes
BEST 1-2 PUNCH CORNERBACK SIGNEES Sometimes you sign a top rated class by position because of pure numbers, at other times it is a matter of quality over quantity. That was the case for Florida this year as the Gators are ranked as signing the 3rd best 1-2 punch at the cornerback position.
Top 1-2 punch cornerback signees
-
